blogPost.excerpt: An email drop by Snazzy AI. In a single click, write emails to pitch investors or potential customers.
blogPost.body: An email drop by Snazzy AI. In a single click, write emails to pitch investors or potential customers.
blogPost.title: AI Emails by Snazzy - Pitch angels, VC’s or potential users with GPT-3
blogPost.author: Chris Frantz

localize.description: 由时时彩人工计划群投的一封邮件。只需点击一下，就可以写邮件向投资者或潜在客户推销。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、风险投资人或潜在用户进行推介

localize.description: 由時時彩人工計劃羣投的一封郵件。只需點擊一下，就可以寫郵件向投資者或潛在客戶推銷。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、風險投資人或潛在用戶進行推介

previous.excerpt: Teams use Ditto to manage and componentize the words across their product from design to production. ⚡ Eliminate error-prone copying and pasting and let developers get back to building. Use our API/CLI to pull up-to-date copy into local directories.
previous.title: Ditto for Developers - Sync the latest copy edits from design to development

localize.description: 团队使用Ditto来管理和组件化整个产品从设计到生产的单词。⚡消除容易出错的复制和粘贴，让开发人员回到开发中去。使用我们的API/CLI将最新的副本拉到本地目录中。
localize.tagline: 从设计到开发同步最新的文案编辑。

localize.description: 團隊使用Ditto來管理和組件化整個產品從設計到生產的單詞。⚡消除容易出錯的複製和粘貼，讓開發人員回到開發中去。使用我們的API/CLI將最新的副本拉到本地目錄中。
localize.tagline: 從設計到開發同步最新的文案編輯。

next.excerpt: Alertly is your personalized slack bot for getting JIRA alerts. Set up important reminders, which are actionable and personalized so that the right person gets notified, all from Slack!
next.title: Alertly.io - Your personalized slack bot for JIRA alerts

localize.description: Alertly是您个性化的Slack机器人，用于获取JIRA提醒。设置重要的提醒，这些提醒是可操作的和个性化的，以便正确的人得到通知，所有这些都来自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您个性化的JIRA警报懒惰机器人

localize.description: Alertly是您個性化的Slack機器人，用於獲取JIRA提醒。設置重要的提醒，這些提醒是可操作的和個性化的，以便正確的人得到通知，所有這些都來自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您個性化的JIRA警報懶惰機器人
